mapper.select: WITH ranked AS ( SELECT c.id, c.name, v.name AS venue, p.start_time, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.id, v.id ORDER BY p.start_time) AS rn FROM performances p JOIN EVENTS e ON p.event_id = e.id JOIN venues v ON p.venue_id = v.id JOIN city c ON c.id = v.city_id WHERE e.id = #{id} ) SELECT id, name, venue FROM ranked WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY start_time;
